markdownRemark.html: It is a 9-hole course, which are presented on a flat land, in a valley with a varied design and spectacular views. The course is situated in Casares (Málaga). In addition to a very fun course, Casares Costa Golf boasts a fantastic restaurant.

frontmatter.title: Casares Costa Golf
frontmatter.description: Casares Costa Golf -  It is a 9-hole course, which are presented on a flat land, in a valley with a varied design and spectacular views. The course is situated in Casares (Málaga). In addition to a very fun course, Casares Costa Golf boasts a fantastic restaurant.
frontmatter.address: Ctra de Casares, Km 0,7, 29690 Casares, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 24.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends euros24.00
